textBeforeTable: Patent Citations In the example of Table 11, it can be seen that the set of routes for station ST1 were selected over the switch link A5 and that all the routes avoid switch link A4 to prevent congestion at A4, because A4 has been used 12 times previously as shown in Table 9.
